value.title: One Slicer to filter other slicers based on Items that has value only in Power BI without BI Directi

value.title: Power BI Apps vs App Workspace (the new Viewer role)

value.title: Power BI: Use DAX to get relative dates
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at how you can get relative dates, in Power BI Desktop, without using the relative date slicer or relative date filters. You just need to sprinkle a little DAX into Power BI Desktop to get this going!  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton

value.title: Power BI: How to Combine Multiple Excel Files from a Folder
value.excerpt: Bonus Video part of www.LearnPowerBI.com training program. In this video I explain how you can use Power BI to combine data from multiple excel files. I also show, for complex scenarios, how you can modify the "Sample File" that Power BI Query automatically creates, in order to update the "Custom Function"

value.title: Count of Unique Values DistinctCount in Power BI Through Power Query Group By Transformation
value.excerpt: You can have a distinct count calculation in multiple places in Power BI, through DAX code, using the Visual's aggregation on a field, or even in Power Query. value.title: Month over Month Calculation in Power BI using DAX
value.excerpt: When working with dates, one of the common types of analysis is period vs period, such as Year over year, and Month over month. value.title: Bidirectional relationships and ambiguity
value.excerpt: Learn how to avoid ambiguity caused by bidirectional relationships in a Tabular model with Power BI or Analysis Services. value.title: Power BI Administration
value.excerpt: This list includes all things related to administering Power BI. This includes dealing with licenses, working with Azure Active Directory and Office 365 and account issues.

topItems.title: Power BI Premium: What is V-CORE pooling?!?
topItems.excerpt: Adam breaks down v-core pooling with Power BI Premium. Explaining where the v-cores come from and how creating a Power BI Premium node affects the v-core pool. topItems.title: Disable free signups in the Power BI service
topItems.excerpt: Learn how you can block free signups for the Power BI service. Free signups are also what are referred to as viral signups.
